attributes.action: lead all MP's in rejecting both a £15,000 pay rise and an unaccountable £23,000 grant. Further we the undersigned pledge to reject at the Polls every sitting MP who votes in favour of such measures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Apparently a key recommendation of a review of MPs' expenses, led by the Speaker Michael Martin, suggests 
MPs could seek to avoid future expenses criticism by awarding themselves an automatic lump sum of £23,000 a year for second homes. The move would avoid the need for MPs to submit claims backed by receipts. Sign this petition if you are against such a proposal or against MP's receiving a £15,000 pay rise.
